sign_in.description: By Logining, you agree to our

sign_up.title: Sign up
sign_up.description: By signing up, you agree to our

form.title: Create a new workspace
form.label: Workspace name
form.image_tip: JPG, PNG SVG or JPEG, max {max}MB

workspace_switcher.title: Workspace
workspace_switcher.empty: No workspace yet, click the button below to create one

create.alert_description: You need to create your first workspace now

join.title: Join workspace
join.description: You've been invited to join {name}, please confirm

preference.title: Preference settings
preference.description: Customize the appearance of the app, including Theme, Theme color and language.
preference.theme_description: Select the theme for the app.
preference.theme_color_description: Change the theme of the app
preference.language_description: Change the language of the app (currently only supports Chinese and English)
preference.alert_description: the settings are saved in the browser cache. If the user returns to the website later, some settings may have changed since the last time the user exited.

danger.title: Danger zone
danger.description: Delete your workspace and all data in it
danger.alert_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete current workspace and remove your data from our servers.

invite_code.title: Invite Members
invite_code.description: Use the invite link to add members to your workspace
invite_code.reset_tip: Resetting the invite link will invalidate the current one and generate a new one

action.remove_tip_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove the member from your workspace and remove their data from our servers.

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.password_max: Password must be at most 16 characters long
validation.username_min: Username must be at least 3 characters long
validation.username_max: Username must be at most 16 characters long

error.login: Login failed, please check your email and password
error.already_member: You are already a member of this workspace
error.not_admin: You are not an admin of this workspace
error.not_member: You are not a member of this workspace
error.update_self: You can't update yourself while only you in this workspace
error.remove_self: You can't remove yourself while only you in this workspace
